articles.author: Lucinda Shen
articles.title: Amidst coronavirus panic, the stock of this hazmat suit-maker is up 88%
articles.description: Investors are taking a renewed interest in companies that specialize in keeping people protected—from other people.

articles.author: Erik Sherman
articles.title: ‘I can’t remember when it’s been down this much so fast’: late day selling pushes Dow down 10% in four days
articles.description: "The coronavirus was just the catalyst to let the genie out of the bottle," said one analyst.

articles.author: Phil Wahba
articles.title: Bath & Body Works’ massive sanitizer business is a rare winner in the coronavirus crisis
articles.description: The retailer is getting a boost from the COVID-19 crisis as it prepares for life away from Victoria's Secret.

articles.author: Danielle Abril
articles.title: Facebook cancels F8 developer conference over coronavirus concerns
articles.description: The news comes as tech companies continue to grapple with whether to host and attend international events as the virus worsens globally.

articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.title: Elizabeth Warren proposes diverting border wall money to fight coronavirus
articles.description: The Prioritizing Pandemic Prevention Act would earmark $10 billion to fight outbreak.

articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: Can Gilead tame the coronavirus?
articles.description: Gilead's coronavirus treatment remdesivir has captured the hopes of public health officials and is rapidly advancing in clinical trials.

articles.author: David Meyer
articles.title: Italy and South Korea join China as coronavirus pariahs as countries close borders
articles.description: Governments, particularly in the Middle East, are scrambling to defend their countries from COVID-19.

articles.author: Adam Lashinsky
articles.title: In the time of coronavirus, Amazon needs to ‘take this crap down’
articles.description: The online bookseller is peddling dangerous misinformation in a time of coronavirus, says Peter Jay Hotez, dean of Baylor University's National School of Tropical Medicine.

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: As stock markets dive, these commodities are leading the plunge down
articles.description: Brent crude's fall since the coronavirus outbreak nears bear territory proportions. Meanwhile, the Dow and S&P 500 are flirting with a correction.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Investors clobber AB InBev as it forecasts worst quarter in a decade on coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: For the world’s largest brewer, the coronavirus presents a particular problem as consumers in China avoid going out in public.

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: The coronavirus is crushing business. Could insurance lessen the blow?
articles.description: COVID-19 is already crushing business, but firms may struggle to obtain insurance coverage for the disruption.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: New coronavirus case in California might signal ‘community spread’ of outbreak
articles.description: Coronavirus in U.S. reached a new stage on Wednesday when a case without known contact with the outbreak popped up on Cali.

articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: Gilead’s coronavirus treatment is barreling its way into new clinical trials
articles.description: Gilead's antiviral remdesivir is headed into two new phase 3 clinical trials across multiple countries to treat COVID-19, the disease caused by novel coronavirus.
